text: Calidifontibacter terrae is a Gram-positive, non-spore-forming, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Calidifontibacter which has been isolated from soil from Hwaseong in Korea. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Calidifontibacter terrae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Calidifontibacter terrae
